If you do not want status codes to cause failures pass the option: `failOnStatusCode: false`

steps.name: page load --waiting for new page to load--
api ("{ method: 'POST', url: 'api/v2/claim/events', body: { name: 'MMMH  event', description: 'Testing - add event by admin', status: true }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }")
addEvent ("api/v2/claim/events"; "{ name: 'MMMH  event', description: 'Testing - add event by admin', status: true }")

api ("{ method: 'POST', url: 'api/v2/pim/employees', body: { firstName: 'Moath', middleName: 'M', lastName: 'Hjjawi', empPicture: '', employeeId: '270' }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }")
addEmployee ("api/v2/pim/employees"; "{ firstName: 'Moath', middleName: 'M', lastName: 'Hjjawi', empPicture: '', employeeId: '270' }")

api ("{ method: 'POST', url: 'api/v2/admin/users', body: { username: 'Moath2260', password: 'moath123', status: true, userRoleId: 2, empNumber: 78 }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }")
addEmployeeLoginInfo ("api/v2/admin/users"; "{ username: 'Moath2260', password: 'moath123', status: true, userRoleId: 2, empNumber: 78 }")
page load --waiting for new page to load--
page load --waiting for new page to load--
page load --waiting for new page to load--

api ("{ method: 'POST', url: 'api/v2/claim/requests', body: { claimEventId: undefined, currencyId: undefined, remarks: 'Testing - request claim by employee.' }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' } }")
requestClaim ("api/v2/claim/requests"; "{ claimEventId: undefined, currencyId: undefined, remarks: 'Testing - request claim by employee.' }")

name: The admin should be able to approve a claim to employee.
fullName: The admin should be able to approve a claim to employee.
